item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Math is still catching up to the genius of Ramanujan (381 points | 197 comments)
3. First images from Euclid are in (534 points | 167 comments)

6. A Controversial Rare-Book Dealer Tries to Rewrite His Own Ending (34 points | 6 comments)
7. Just want simple TLS for your .internal network? (24 points | 6 comments)
8. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (262 points | 94 comments)
9. Cosine (YC W23) Hiring JavaScript/TS Dev to Build AI SWE ( | hide)
10. Writing a Mathematica Interpreter in Typescript (28 points | 2 comments)

21. New discovery reveals how diatoms capture CO2 so effectively (67 points | 13 comments)
22. Apple's AirPods Pro hearing health features (164 points | 85 comments)
23. Transformers Utilization in Chart Understanding: A Review of Advances and Future (27 points | 2 comments)
24. Mind Wandering: More than a Bad Habit (2018) [pdf] (81 points | 27 comments)
25. Transitioning the Use of Cryptographic Algorithms and Key Lengths (67 points | 26 comments)
26. Vimium – The Hacker's Browser (46 points | 33 comments)
27. Thought experiments that fray the fabric of space-time (100 points | 102 comments)

29. Show HN: Floating point arithmetic types in C++ for any size and any base (75 points | 30 comments)
30. ByteDance sacks intern for sabotaging AI project (172 points | 174 comments)
